title: Vege Rama - Post Office Square
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Indian, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Catering
description: Its 2nd outlet in Brisbane and primarily a takeaway, opened since 2012. As of 2016 it's reported to now be all-vegan. Large selection of hot foods, salads, raw foods, and sweets, enchiladas, curries, pizza wraps, Indian finger foods, pudding. Bottled and house-made cold drinks. Caters to special requirements like-gluten free and low-fat diets.
streetAddress: 270 - 280 Queen St, Post Office Square, Shop 30
